channel.title: Get FireFox campaign
channel.description:
No, i didnt submit this, but it works out right?
i used the background and border tut from ScotaloticaS and this is basically my variation
BTW this is me first 1 :)

item.title: Get FireFox campaign
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Sux0rz.

The backgrounds not to bad, although maybe a red and orange blend to represent firefox sort of colors would be better than grey.

Download some better fonts, and make sure that the color of the text mixes nicely with its surroundings.

Place the text in better places, also. Overlapping is good only when it is done correctly, and everything is legible. ;\

Read full topic

Im sure that many users of firefox would object to the use of 1337-5p34k, and its rather big for a sig

item.title: Get FireFox campaign

item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

Eh not a big fan of the border , Needs more color…I like the color of the text just not the text itself…

Tip: Pixel Fonts dont look really good when there big…
